text: Violet & Daisy is an action, comedy and drama movie of 2011. It was released in June 2013. It is about two teenage assassins who take a job they think may be easy. However, their plan is changed by one of the people they plan to kill. James Gandolfini plays Michael. Alexis Bledel plays Violet. Reviews of the movie were mostly negative. Running time for the movie is 88 minutes. Category:American thriller movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:2011 movies
title: Violet & Daisy
